titleStmt.title: Hold fast a sermon preached at Pauls Crosse vpon Sunday being the xxxi. of October, Anno Domini 1624. By Iohn Gee, Master of Arts, late of Exon Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Gee, John, 1596-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. M[athewes] and I. N[orton] for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be sold at his shop at the great south doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the great south doore of Pauls
